item.description:
This is being offered in Methuen
Ho' oponopono
From ancient Hawaiian traditions, this meditation on reconciliation and forgiveness has the ability to lift much off of your shoulders if you are holding any guilt, regret, jealously or anything else that might affect you relationship with others around you.
This meditation is being delivered by a guest who is level 3 Huna expert.

If we have time we will also learn Self Identity Ho'oponopono. They are not the same. this one has been popularized by Joe Vitale in 'Zero Limits'. There is a wonderful story and history around this. I hope we have time.

This will be a very special evening and has the real possibility of being life changing for any who attend.
Come dressed for the occasion if you like.

Aloha!
item.how_to_find_us: Garden Room - Bottom Floor of Library

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater.Boston. NLP Meetup - Methuen - Ho'oponopono
